document.discussion_title: Woman killed in Holly Springs shooting - Live5News.com | Charleston, SC | News, Weather, Sports
document.topic_text: Woman killed in Holly Springs shooting 2016-04-25T17:09:19Z Popeye's in Holly Springs (Source: Google Maps) HOLLY SPRINGS, MS (WMC) - Holly Springs Police Department confirmed a woman shot behind a restaurant on Highway 7 died from her injuries. Investigators received word that the woman had been shot just before 12 p.m. behind the Popeyes in Holly Springs. Police are gathering evidence in the area as they work to learn what happened before the shooting, but they have confirmed that the woman did not survive the shooting. WMC Action News 5's Justin Jaggers is working to gather more details. He'll have a full report on WMC Action News 5 at 5. Copyright 2016 WMC Action News 5. All rights reserved.
